typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		year as integer,
		industry_code_ANZSIC as string,
		industry_name_ANZSIC as string,
		rme_size_grp as string,
		variable as string,
		value as integer,
		unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> FinancialYearSizeBands
FinancialYearSizeBands pivot(groupBy(industry_name_ANZSIC),
	pivotBy(variable),
	Sum_of_Variable = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
